name: Counting Sheep (fgnm)
description:
A Game for libGDX Jam December 2020. It's a no-sense point and click game built entirely with HyperLap2D Editor and Runtime for libGDX.

Graphics made by Angelo Navarro: https://instagram.com/angelonavarro_sketch

HyperLap2D: https://hyperlap2d.rednblack.games/
